var instance_name = gs.getProperty('glide.servlet.uri'); var sub1 = ''; if(event.parm2=='first reminder'){ sub1 = 'Action%20required%20-%201st%20Reminder%20of%20not%20updated%20Problem%20Ticket(s)'; } else if(event.parm2=='second reminder'){ sub1 = 'Action%20required%20-%202nd%20Reminder%20of%20not%20updated%20Problem%20Ticket(s)'; } else if(event.parm2=='third reminder'){ sub1 = 'Action%20required%20-%203rd%20Reminder%20of%20not%20updated%20Problem%20Ticket(s)'; } var emailaddress=gs.getProperty('glide.email.user'); template.print("
   

Attention:

SNOW Assignment Group Manager and Deputy

How this affects you:

As an Assignment Group Manager or Deputy, you are responsible to ensure the proper handling of problem tickets assigned to your group(s).

${mail_script:SubEmailEscalationPM_Not_Updated}

Additional Information:

Immediate action is necessary on these overdue Problem ticket(s).

For a list of these Problem tickets please refer to

'My Groups Problems Overdue' in SNOW or use the following dashboard:

Assignment Group Manager Dashboard.

*Please note: The list of tickets on the dashboard may contain additional problems violating other Incident handling standards.

More information specific to the escalation process, together with useful Tools & Procedures can be found in Ourspace.
"); template.print("

Problem Management Reminder: Managed/Updated ticket(s)

 

   

Attention:

SNOW Assignment Group Manager and Deputy

How this affects you:

As an Assignment Group Manager or Deputy, you are responsible to ensure the proper handling of problem tickets assigned to your group(s).

${mail_script:SubEmailEscalationPM_Not_Updated}

Additional Information:

Immediate action is necessary on these overdue Problem ticket(s).

For a list of these Problem tickets please refer to

'My Groups Problems Overdue' in SNOW or use the following dashboard:

Assignment Group Manager Dashboard.

*Please note: The list of tickets on the dashboard may contain additional problems violating other Incident handling standards.

More information specific to the escalation process, together with useful Tools & Procedures can be found in Ourspace.

 ${mail_script:Email escalation contact us}

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_label/><action_name/><action_query>false</action_query><action_run_at>server</action_run_at><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><application/><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>problem</collection><condition>current.state.changesFrom(4)</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Problem Reactivated</name><onclick/><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><read_access_action>false</read_access_action><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[current.u_reactivation_count_pbm++;
current.active = true; //INC008909992 - Active fields is being set to true when ticket is reopened.
//INC008849178 - Clear the fields 'Closed' and 'Closed by' on reopen
if(!current.closed_by.nil()){
	current.closed_by = '';
}
if(!current.closed_at.nil()){
	current.closed_at = '';
}//INC008849178-End
// commented & made before update as part of performance upgrade - MIKTOPERFORM
//update and email trigger introdcued as part of CR00031549
gs.eventQueue("problem.reactivated",current,current.assignment_group);

// Below email trigger  is added as part of MRel13.7 CR00072291
if(current.work_notes != ''){
	var comments = current.work_notes.getJournalEntry(1);
	var index1 = comments.indexOf("\n");
	subStr1 = comments.toString().substring(index1+1);	
	gs.eventQueue("problem.reactivated.to.watchlist",current,subStr1);
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>alex.broggi</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2009-07-10 06:31:20</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>635bde5a0a0a3c190094a93f5264c6e5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Problem Reactivated</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="SR Problem Management">5b1ef01edbfa23008457f6700f9619f3</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_635bde5a0a0a3c190094a93f5264c6e5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>SRZSI1</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-01-06 16:16:33</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_label/><action_name/><action_query>false</action_query><action_run_at/><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><application/><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>problem</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="problem">follow_upVALCHANGES^follow_upISNOTEMPTY^EQ<item endquery="false" field="follow_up" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="follow_up" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Update Follow Up time</name><onclick/><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><read_access_action>false</read_access_action><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous) {
	try
		{ 
	
		var sysId=current.sys_id.toString();
		var scriptStr="var gr = new GlideRecord('"+current.sys_class_name+"');\n" +
	"gr.addQuery('sys_id="+sysId+"');\n" +
	"gr.query();\n" +
				
	"if(gr.next() && (new GlideDateTime(gr.follow_up.toString()).getNumericValue()==new GlideDateTime('"+current.follow_up.toString()+"').getNumericValue())  ){\n" +
				
	" gr.follow_up='';if((gr.sys_class_name=='problem' &&  gr.state =='3')){gr.work_notes='Ticket set back to \\'In Analysis\\' status due to \\'Follow up\\' date / time being reached'; gr.state = '5';} \n" +	
	"gs.log('>> Before actual update of the record '+gr.number+' at time = '+gs.nowDateTime());\n"+			
	"  gr.update();\n"+
	"gs.log('>> After actual Update of the record '+gr.number+' at time ='+gs.nowDateTime());	\n }";
			
var scheduler = new ScheduleOnce();
scheduler.setLabel('Update Follow up time  : ' + current.name);		
scheduler.script =scriptStr;
scheduler.setTime(new GlideDateTime(current.follow_up));
gs.log("Update follow up time scheduled at "+current.follow_up);
gs.log(">> Before reaching Follow up time for the record "+current.number+" at time = "+gs.nowDateTime());
scheduler.schedule();
gs.log(">> After reaching Follow up time for the record "+current.number+" at time ="+gs.nowDateTime());			
		}
	catch(e)
		{
			gs.log("Exception caught in BR -Update Follow Up time, and exception message = "+e);
		}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>SRZSI1</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-05-03 10:15:03</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>9d4762d6dbf5d7805a31fd161d9619d7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update Follow Up time</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="SR Problem Management">5b1ef01edbfa23008457f6700f9619f3</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_9d4762d6dbf5d7805a31fd161d9619d7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>SRZSI1</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-01-06 16:16:33</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script></record_update>

var instance_name = gs.getProperty('glide.servlet.uri'); var sub1 = ''; if(event.parm2=='first reminder'){ sub1 = 'Action%20required%20-%201st%20Reminder%20of%20Unassigned%20Problem%20Ticket(s)'; } else if(event.parm2=='second reminder'){ sub1 = 'Action%20required%20-%202nd%20Reminder%20of%20Unassigned%20Problem%20Ticket(s)'; } else if(event.parm2=='third reminder'){ sub1 = 'Action%20required%20-%203rd%20Reminder%20of%20Unassigned%20Problem%20Ticket(s)'; } var emailaddress=gs.getProperty('glide.email.user'); template.print("
   

Attention:

SNOW Assignment Group Manager and Deputy

How this affects you:

As an Assignment Group Manager or Deputy, you are responsible to ensure the proper handling of problem tickets assigned to your group(s).

${mail_script:SubEmailEscalationPM_Unassigned}

Additional Information:

Immediate action is necessary on these overdue Problem ticket(s) that have not been  assigned to a group member.

For a list of these Problem tickets please refer to

'My Groups Problems Overdue' in SNOW or use the following dashboard:

Assignment Group Manager Dashboard.

*Please note: The list of tickets on the dashboard may contain additional problems violating other Incident handling standards.

More information specific to the escalation process, together with useful Tools & Procedures can be found in Ourspace.
"); template.print("
"); template.print("
"); template.print("
Contact us: Call
 Request support
"); ]]>

Additional Information:

For a list of these Problem tickets please refer to

*Please note: The list of tickets on the dashboard may contain additional problems violating other Incident handling standards.

More information specific to the escalation process, together with useful Tools & Procedures can be found in Ourspace.

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_fec52e29db9d97407193f7b31d96194b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_label/><action_name/><action_query>false</action_query><action_run_at/><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><application/><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>problem</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>problem autoclose</name><onclick/><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><read_access_action>false</read_access_action><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[// This is the Business Rule to auto close problem
// This is called from a schedule job
var ps = gs.getProperty('glide.ui.autosetclose.pbm');
var prob = new GlideRecord('problem');
prob.addQuery('problem_state',3);
prob.query();
while(prob.next()){ 
   var probnumb = prob.sys_id;
   var lininc = prob.u_linked_incident;
   var rcac = prob.u_rcac; 
   var prv = prob.u_prv; 
   var dontpp = prob.u_dnotpp;
   var pbmLstUpdated = prob.sys_updated_on.toString(); 
   var incidents = 0;  
   var lastUpdated;
   var flag_closed = 0;

/* Start of Comments by S3PTSQ
  var count = new GlideAggregate('incident'); 
  count.addQuery('problem_id', probnumb); 
  count.addQuery('incident_state', 7); 
  count.addAggregate('COUNT'); 
  count.query();
  if(count.next()) {
     incidents = count.getAggregate('COUNT');
  } 
 End of Comments by S3PTSQ
*/
   flag_closed = checkClosedIncidents(probnumb);
   if (flag_closed == 0) { 
      var inc = new GlideRecord('incident');
      inc.addQuery('problem_id', probnumb);
      inc.orderByDesc('sys_updated_on');
      inc.query();
      if(inc.next()) { 
         var incLstUpdated = inc.sys_updated_on.toString(); 
         lastUpdated = (incLstUpdated>pbmLstUpdated)?incLstUpdated:pbmLstUpdated;
         if(lastUpdated < gs.daysAgo(ps) && ((rcac == true && prv == true) || dontpp == true)) {
            prob.problem_state = 4; 
            prob.update(); 
         }
      }
      else {  
         lastUpdated = pbmLstUpdated;
         if(lastUpdated < gs.daysAgo(ps) && ((rcac == true && prv == true) || dontpp == true)) {
            prob.problem_state = 4;
            prob.update();
         }
      }
   }
}
// Function to check if all the linked incidents are closed
// Return Flag = 0 -- All linked and child incidents are closed 
// Return Flag = 1 -- At least one incident/linked child is not closed 
function checkClosedIncidents(problem_number) {
   var linkedIncident = new GlideAggregate('incident');
   linkedIncident.addQuery('problem_id',problem_number);
   linkedIncident.addQuery('incident_state','!=',7);
   linkedIncident.addAggregate('COUNT');
   linkedIncident.query();
   var flag = 0;
   if (linkedIncident.next()) {
       var linkinccount = linkedIncident.getAggregate('COUNT');
       if (linkinccount > 0) {
          flag = 1;
          return flag;
       }
   }
   var childIncident = new GlideRecord('incident');
   childIncident.addQuery('problem_id',problem_number);
   childIncident.addQuery('u_child','>',0);
   childIncident.query();
   while(childIncident.next()) {
       var childIncidentRecord = new GlideAggregate('incident');
       childIncidentRecord.addQuery('parent', childIncident.sys_id);
       childIncidentRecord.addQuery('incident_state','!=',7);
       childIncidentRecord.addAggregate('COUNT');
       childIncidentRecord.query();
       if (childIncidentRecord.next()) {
           var linkinccount_child = childIncidentRecord.getAggregate('COUNT');
           if (linkinccount_child > 0) {
              flag = 1;
              return flag;
           }
       }
   }
   return flag;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>S55ZD3</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-04-06 05:38:44</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>fec52e29db9d97407193f7b31d96194b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>problem autoclose</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="SR Problem Management">5b1ef01edbfa23008457f6700f9619f3</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_fec52e29db9d97407193f7b31d96194b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>SRZSI1</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-01-06 16:16:33</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script></record_update>

var instance_name = gs.getProperty('glide.servlet.uri'); var sub1 = ''; var firstparm=event.parm1.split(','); /* Check if the parm2 is an object and parm2 should not be other strings */ if(typeof event.parm2=='object' && (event.parm2!='first escalation' && event.parm2!='second escalation' && event.parm2!='third escalation')) { var paramArr=event.parm2.toString().split('@'); // splitting the groups,incident tickets var escalationType=paramArr[0]; //getting the escalation type var dataObjPerManager=JSON.parse(paramArr[1]); // converting the Obj to String if(escalationType=='first_escalation_inc_groupedBy_manager' || escalationType=='second_escalation_inc_groupedBy_manager' || escalationType=='third_escalation_inc_groupedBy_manager') { if(escalationType=='first_escalation_inc_groupedBy_manager'){ //1st escalation of INC sub1='Action%20required%20:%2030%20days%20escalation%20of%20overdue%20Incident%20ticket(s)'; } else if(escalationType=='second_escalation_inc_groupedBy_manager'){ //2nd escalation of INC sub1='Action%20required%20:%2060%20days%20escalation%20of%20overdue%20Incident%20ticket(s)'; } else if(escalationType=='third_escalation_inc_groupedBy_manager'){ //3rd escalation of INC sub1='Action%20required%20:%2090%20days%20escalation%20of%20overdue%20Incident%20ticket(s)'; } } } var emailaddress=gs.getProperty('glide.email.user'); template.print("

As an Assignment Group Manager or Deputy, you are responsible to ensure the proper handling of incident tickets assigned to your group(s).

${mail_script:Incident email escalation subject}

Action Required:

To access the list of overdue tickets, please refer to

'My Groups Incident Overdue' in SNOW or use the following dashboard:

Assignment Group Manager Dashboard.

For further information on the escalation process, click here.
"); template.print("

Incident Management: Overdue ticket(s)

 

   

Attention:

SNOW Assignment Group Manager and Deputy

How this affects you:

As an Assignment Group Manager or Deputy, you are responsible to ensure the proper handling of incident tickets assigned to your group(s).

${mail_script:Incident email escalation subject}

Action Required:

Immediate action is necessary on these overdue Incident ticket(s).

For a list of these Incident tickets please refer to

'My Groups Incident Overdue' in SNOW or use the following dashboard:

Assignment Group Manager Dashboard.

*Please note: The list of tickets on the dashboard may contain additional incidents violating other Incident handling standards.

More information specific to the escalation process, together with useful Tools & Procedures can be found in Ourspace.

 ${mail_script:Incident Email escalation contact us}

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_label/><action_name/><action_query>false</action_query><action_run_at>server</action_run_at><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><application/><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>problem</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="problem">assignment_groupVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="assignment_group" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>AttachOLAonChangeOfAssignmentGroup</name><onclick/><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><read_access_action>false</read_access_action><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	var tSLA = new GlideRecord('task_sla');
	tSLA.addQuery('task',current.sys_id);
	tSLA.addQuery('sla','55617b71db80c30053e5fc600f961952');/* SLA definition: "Email Escalation_PM_notAssigned"*/
	tSLA.addQuery('stage','IN','in_progress,breached');
	tSLA.query();
	while(tSLA.next()){       /*when assignment group changes, the older SLA gets cancelled*/
tSLA.active = false;
		tSLA.stage = 'cancelled';
var wf = new Workflow(); 
   if (wf.hasWorkflow(tSLA)) {  
         wf.cancel(tSLA);
   }
tSLA.update();
	}
//gs.log('Ch123-->sid '+tSLA.sys_id);
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>S8GXCD</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-07-21 06:44:35</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>9559b056db80070053e5fc600f9619fc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>28</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AttachOLAonChangeOfAssignmentGroup</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="SR Problem Management">5b1ef01edbfa23008457f6700f9619f3</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_9559b056db80070053e5fc600f9619fc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>SRZSI1</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-01-06 16:16:33</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script></record_update>

problem

Problem Management Escalation: Overdue ticket(s)

 

var instance_name = gs.getProperty('glide.servlet.uri'); var sub1 = ''; var firstparm=event.parm1.split(','); /* Check if the parm2 is an object and parm2 should not be other strings */ if(typeof event.parm2=='object' && (event.parm2!='first escalation' && event.parm2!='second escalation' && event.parm2!='third escalation')) { var paramArr=event.parm2.toString().split('@'); // splitting the groups,problem tickets var escalationType=paramArr[0]; //getting the escalation type var dataObjPerManager=JSON.parse(paramArr[1]); // converting the Obj to String if(escalationType=='first_escalation_prb_groupedBy_manager' || escalationType=='second_escalation_prb_groupedBy_manager' || escalationType=='third_escalation_prb_groupedBy_manager') { if(escalationType=='first_escalation_prb_groupedBy_manager'){ //1st escalation of prb sub1='Action%20required%20:%2030%20days%20escalation%20of%20overdue%20problem%20ticket(s)'; } else if(escalationType=='second_escalation_prb_groupedBy_manager'){ //2nd escalation of prb sub1='Action%20required%20:%2060%20days%20escalation%20of%20overdue%20problem%20ticket(s)'; } else if(escalationType=='third_escalation_prb_groupedBy_manager'){ //3rd escalation of prb sub1='Action%20required%20:%2090%20days%20escalation%20of%20overdue%20problem%20ticket(s)'; } } } var emailaddress=gs.getProperty('glide.email.user'); template.print("
   

Attention:

${mail_script:problem attention line}

How this affects you:

As an Assignment Group Manager or Deputy, you are responsible to ensure the proper handling of problem tickets assigned to your group(s).

${mail_script:SubEmailEscalationPM_Not_Updated}

Action Required:

Please take Immediate action on the overdue Problem ticket(s).

To access the list of overdue tickets, please refer to

'My Groups Problems Overdue' in SNOW or use the following dashboard:

Assignment Group Manager Dashboard.

For further information on the escalation process, click here.
"); template.print("
"); template.print("
"); template.print("
Contact us: Call
 Request support
"); ]]>

Problem Management Escalation: Managed/Updated ticket(s)

 

   

Attention:

SNOW Assignment Group Manager and Deputy

How this affects you:

As an Assignment Group Manager or Deputy, you are responsible to ensure the proper handling of problem tickets assigned to your group(s).

${mail_script:SubEmailEscalationPM_Not_Updated}

Additional Information:

Immediate action is necessary on these overdue Problem ticket(s).

For a list of these Problem tickets please refer to

'My Groups Problems Overdue' in SNOW or use the following dashboard:

Assignment Group Manager Dashboard.

*Please note: The list of tickets on the dashboard may contain additional problems violating other Incident handling standards.

More information specific to the escalation process, together with useful Tools & Procedures can be found in Ourspace.

 ${mail_script:Email escalation contact us}

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_f56c1f9dc611227b001a7aa4be438d49
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_label/><action_name/><action_query>false</action_query><action_run_at>server</action_run_at><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><application/><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>problem</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>problem events</name><onclick/><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><read_access_action>false</read_access_action><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[if (current.operation() == 'insert' && current.u_problem_call_code == "Incident Management") {
	gs.eventQueue("problem.assigned_to_group", current, current.assignment_group.getDisplayValue());
}

if (current.operation() == 'insert' && current.u_problem_call_code != "Incident Management") {
	gs.eventQueue("problem.inserted", current, gs.getUserID(), gs.getUserName());
}

if (current.operation() == 'update') {
	gs.eventQueue("problem.updated", current, gs.getUserID(), gs.getUserName());
}

if (!current.assigned_to.nil() && current.assigned_to.changes()) {
	gs.eventQueue("problem.assigned", current, current.assigned_to.getDisplayValue() , previous.assigned_to.getDisplayValue());
}

if (current.escalation.changes() && current.escalation > previous.escalation && previous.escalation != -1) {
	gs.eventQueue("problem.escalated", current, current.escalation , previous.escalation );
}

if (current.operation() == 'insert' && !current.assignment_group.nil() && current.assignment_group.changes() && current.u_problem_call_code != "Incident Management") {
	gs.eventQueue("problem.assigned_to_group", current, current.assignment_group.getDisplayValue() ,   previous.assignment_group.getDisplayValue());
}

if (current.operation() == 'update' && !current.assignment_group.nil() && current.assignment_group.changes()) {
	gs.eventQueue("problem.assigned_to_group", current, current.assignment_group.getDisplayValue() , previous.assignment_group.getDisplayValue());
}

if (current.operation() == 'update' && current.state.changes() && current.state == 4) {
	gs.eventQueue("problem.resolved", current, current.state, previous.state);
	
	// Below email trigger  is added as part of MRel13.7 CR00072291
	var comments = current.work_notes.getJournalEntry(1);
	var subStr1 = '';
	var index = comments.indexOf(" -");
	var subStr = comments.toString().substring(0,index);
	var dif = gs.dateDiff(subStr, gs.nowDateTime(), true);
	if(comments != '' && dif <= 10){
		var index1 = comments.indexOf("\n");
		subStr1 = comments.toString().substring(index1+1);
	}	
	gs.eventQueue("problem.resolved.to.watchlist", current,subStr1);
}
//Commented for SMP JIRA ITSM-661, as resolved and closed are same choice value. 
/*
if (current.operation() == 'update' && current.state.changes() && current.state == 4) {
	gs.eventQueue("problem.closed", current, current.state, previous.state);
}
*/

// Below email trigger  is added as part of MRel13.7 CR00072291
if (current.operation() == 'update' && current.state.changes() && current.state == 3) {
	gs.eventQueue("problem.Waiting_for_change", current);
}

if (!current.u_problem_coordinator.nil() && current.u_problem_coordinator.changes()) {
	gs.eventQueue("problem.assigned_coordinator", current, current.u_problem_coordinator.getDisplayValue() ,         previous.u_problem_coordinator.getDisplayValue());
}

if (current.work_notes.changes()&& (!current.state.changes())) {
	//gs.addInfoMessage("passed");
	var cmt = current.work_notes.getJournalEntry(1);
	gs.eventQueue("problem.worknotes",current,cmt);
}

//added below scripts as part of MRel 13.7 CR00072291
if(current.watch_list.changes() && (current.state == 1 || current.state == 2))
	{
	var previous_WL_Length = previous.watch_list.split(',').length;
	var current_WL_Length = current.watch_list.split(',').length;
	var previous_WL = previous.watch_list;
	var current_WL = current.watch_list;
	
	if(previous.watch_list.getDisplayValue() == ''){
		previous_WL_Length = 0;
		previous_WL = '';
	}
	
	if(previous_WL_Length < current_WL_Length){
		var email_to = [];
		var i;
		var mem = current.watch_list.split(',');
		for(i=0;i<current_WL_Length;i++){
			if(previous_WL.indexOf(mem[i]) == -1){
				email_to.push(mem[i]);
			}// End IF
		}//End For
		if(email_to != ''){
			gs.eventQueue('Watchlist.member.added',current,email_to,'');
			//gs.addInfoMessage('Email sent to '+email_to);
		}//End IF
	}//End Second IF
}// End First IF

//added below scripts as part of MRel 13.7 CR00072291
if(current.priority.changes() && (previous.priority != '') && (current.priority.changesTo(1) || current.priority.changesTo(2))){
	// Priority changes to HIGH Or CRITICAL.
	var asg = '';
	if(current.assigned_to != '')
		{
		var emailTo = current.assigned_to;
		asg = current.assigned_to.name;
	}
	else{
		var emailTo = current.assignment_group;
		asg = current.assignment_group.name;
	}
	var comments = current.work_notes.getJournalEntry(1);
	var subStr1 = '';
	var index = comments.indexOf(" -");
	var subStr = comments.toString().substring(0,index);
	var dif = gs.dateDiff(subStr, gs.nowDateTime(), true);
	if(comments != '' && dif <= 10){
		var index1 = comments.indexOf("\n");
		subStr1 = comments.toString().substring(index1+1);
	}
	Values = previous.priority.getDisplayValue()+ ',' + asg + ',' +subStr1;
	gs.eventQueue("Problem.priority", current, emailTo, Values);
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2005-03-30 21:44:26</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>f56c1f9dc611227b001a7aa4be438d49</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>problem events</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="System (apps/system1)" source="apps/system1">d9c72d616f211200f4a14c992e3ee418</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="SR Problem Management">5b1ef01edbfa23008457f6700f9619f3</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_f56c1f9dc611227b001a7aa4be438d49</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>SRZSI1</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-01-06 16:16:33</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_label/><action_name/><action_query>false</action_query><action_run_at>server</action_run_at><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><application/><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>problem</collection><condition>current.problem_state.changes() || current.opened_at.changes() || current.description.changes() || current.short_description.changes()</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>DPM update with Problem Status</name><onclick/><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><read_access_action>false</read_access_action><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[//This is to update all dpm reports linked to a problem
updateDpmRecord();

function updateDpmRecord() {

//Search for all the incidents related to the problem
var incidentRecord = new GlideRecord('incident');
incidentRecord.addQuery('problem_id',current.sys_id);
incidentRecord.query();
while(incidentRecord.next()){

//For each incident linked to the problem, search for all the dpm reports linked 
var dpmRecord = new GlideRecord('u_dpm');
dpmRecord.addQuery('u_incident',incidentRecord.sys_id);
dpmRecord.query();
while(dpmRecord.next()){

//Update the fields ('problem state' and 'opened date') of all the dpm reports found
dpmRecord.u_problem_state_dpm = current.problem_state;
dpmRecord.u_problem_opened_dpm = current.opened_at;
dpmRecord.u_problem_short_description_dp = current.short_description;
dpmRecord.u_problem_description_dpm = current.description;
dpmRecord.u_problem_close_notes = current.close_notes;
dpmRecord.u_rfc_id_dapr = current.u_rfc__maximo_;
dpmRecord.update();

}
}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>S7CXXP</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2010-05-31 11:56:19</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>ee3611180a0a3c2c01b8734b50ee93e0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DPM update with Problem Status</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package/><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="SR Problem Management">5b1ef01edbfa23008457f6700f9619f3</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_ee3611180a0a3c2c01b8734b50ee93e0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>SRZSI1</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-01-06 16:16:33</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
problem

Problem Management Escalation: Overdue ticket(s)

 

 
var instance_name = gs.getProperty('glide.servlet.uri'); var sub1 = ''; var firstparm=event.parm1.split(','); /* Check if the parm2 is an object and parm2 should not be other strings */ if(typeof event.parm2=='object' && (event.parm2!='first escalation' && event.parm2!='second escalation' && event.parm2!='third escalation')) { var paramArr=event.parm2.toString().split('@'); // splitting the groups,problem tickets var escalationType=paramArr[0]; //getting the escalation type var dataObjPerManager=JSON.parse(paramArr[1]); // converting the Obj to String if(escalationType=='first_escalation_prb_groupedBy_manager' || escalationType=='second_escalation_prb_groupedBy_manager' || escalationType=='third_escalation_prb_groupedBy_manager') { if(escalationType=='first_escalation_prb_groupedBy_manager'){ //1st escalation of prb sub1='Action%20required%20:%2030%20days%20escalation%20of%20overdue%20ticket(s)'; } else if(escalationType=='second_escalation_prb_groupedBy_manager'){ //2nd escalation of prb sub1='Action%20required%20:%2060%20days%20escalation%20of%20overdue%20ticket(s)'; } else if(escalationType=='third_escalation_prb_groupedBy_manager'){ //3rd escalation of prb sub1='Action%20required%20:%2090%20days%20escalation%20of%20overdue%20ticket(s)'; } } } var emailaddress=gs.getProperty('glide.email.user'); template.print("
   

Attention:

${mail_script:problem attention line}

How this affects you:

As an Assignment Group Manager or Deputy, you are responsible to ensure the proper handling of problem tickets assigned to your group(s).

${mail_script:SubEmailEscalationPM_Unassigned}

Action Required:

Please take Immediate action on the overdue Problem ticket(s).

To access the list of overdue tickets, please refer to

'My Groups Problems Overdue' in SNOW or use the following dashboard:

Assignment Group Manager Dashboard.

For further information on escalation process, click here.
"); template.print("
"); template.print("
"); template.print("
Contact us: Call
 Request support
"); ]]>

Problem Management Escalation: Managed/updated ticket(s)

 

 
   

Attention:

SNOW Assignment Group Manager and Deputy

How this affects you:

As an Assignment Group Manager or Deputy, you are responsible to ensure the proper handling of problem tickets assigned to your group(s).

${mail_script:SubEmailEscalationPM_Unassigned}

Additional Information:

Immediate action is necessary on these overdue Problem ticket(s) that have not been  assigned to a group member.

For a list of these Problem tickets please refer to

'My Groups Problems Overdue' in SNOW or use the following dashboard:

Assignment Group Manager Dashboard.

*Please note: The list of tickets on the dashboard may contain additional problems violating other Incident handling standards.

More information specific to the escalation process, together with useful Tools & Procedures can be found in Ourspace.

 ${mail_script:Email escalation contact us}

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_label/><action_name/><action_query>false</action_query><action_run_at>server</action_run_at><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><application/><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>problem</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="problem">sys_mod_countVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="sys_mod_count" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>AttachOLAonUpdate</name><onclick/><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><read_access_action>false</read_access_action><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	var tSLA = new GlideRecord('task_sla');
	tSLA.addQuery('task',current.sys_id);
	tSLA.addQuery('sla','aa2dd11bdbccc70009f378100f961935');/* SLA definition: "Email Escalation_Problem_notUpdated"*/
	tSLA.addQuery('stage','IN','in_progress');
	tSLA.query();
	if(tSLA.next()){ /*As soom as the Problem ticket is updates the current SLA gets cancelled*/
tSLA.active = false;
		tSLA.stage = 'cancelled';
var wf = new Workflow(); 
   if (wf.hasWorkflow(tSLA)) {  
         wf.cancel(tSLA);
   }
tSLA.update();
	}
//gs.log('Ch123-->sid '+tSLA.sys_id);
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>S8GXCD</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-07-25 05:10:00</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>77c1596bdb80030009f378100f961963</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AttachOLAonUpdate</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="SR Problem Management">5b1ef01edbfa23008457f6700f9619f3</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_77c1596bdb80030009f378100f961963</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>SRZSI1</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-01-06 16:16:33</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script></record_update>
